alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 20 at 9:04PM CDT until April 25 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Above Philadelphia affecting Neshoba County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. Yockanookany River Near Ofahoma affecting Leake County. Pearl River At Jackson affecting Rankin and Hinds Counties. Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River Near Carthage. * WHEN...Until Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Widespread flooding of lowlands upstream and downstream of the State Highway 35 bridge is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 20.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:45 PM CDT Wednesday was 20.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to crest at 20.7 feet early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Pearl River Carthage 17.0 20.5 Wed 6 pm CDT 20.6 20.2 19.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 900 AM CDT.
